features: ​Disney's Wish Woodland Animals of Rosas Surprise Set will delight fans of the animated musical with an Asha of Rosas fashion doll and six storytelling surprises!
Featuring her signature removable dress and shoes, Asha fashion doll captures her onscreen character with long, soft braided hair for endless styling fun!
Kids open each surprise to reveal either a woodland animal friend or a storytelling accessory!
​Wishes can come true with this surprise-filled playset – it's a magical gift that lets kids to play out memorable movie scenes!
​Fans can collect their favorite characters to create their own Disney's Wish adventures (each sold separately, subject to availability),
body.description: Inspired by Disney's Wish, the Woodland Animals of Rosas Surprise Set brings the magic to life with hidden surprises kids reveal with unboxing! Kids start by discovering the Asha of Rosas fashion doll, featuring her signature removable fashion and long, soft, braided hair. Then, discover six surprises one by one, including different storytelling accessories. Each piece captures the magic and heart from the animated musical and lets fans ages 3 years old and up re-create favorite movie moments. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enter the kingdom of Rosas with fashion dolls inspired by Disney’s Wish! Fans can recreate or imagine different adventures with characters like Asha or Dahlia! The small doll playsets bring the animated world to life with different, unique play areas inspired by the film and tons of storytelling accessories. Unwrap Disney's Wish Star Reveals surprise set to discover and collect the character's multiple facial expressions.

Discover magical adventures in the world of Rosas with favorite characters from Disney’s Wish. Kids can celebrate the magic of wishing and collect dolls, playsets, and accessories inspired by the movie to play out their biggest dreams!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After seeing wish, my daughter was obsessed with the movie. Of course, Santa brought this for Christmas, knowing that he would love an Asha doll. It’s been a HUGE hit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doll is more fun than the movie
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed overall with the Wish movie, but I've still got to give Disney props for their character design. The dress, the hair, the freckles all make for a distinctive Disney heroine and the doll looks as good as she did in the movie. And for young kids - who aren't jaded about film theory and enjoyed the movie more than I did - this would be a fantastic gift.The doll itself is best described as Barbie doll quality - poseable with limits but with great hair and clothes. The "secret" woodland friends make for a unique and fun unboxing experience - it's a cute idea, and also gives you a little more bang for your buck. The additional figurines aren't poseable or anything, but still provide more opportunities for imaginative play.Short story: good quality doll that even an old jaded fuddy-duddy like me can appreciate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent doll set
reviews.reviewText: The doll is excellent, accurate to the movie character Asha, it comes with little friends that makes a good companion to show. Mattel does quality dolls, so I'm sure they will remain entirely the same as long as you take care of them. this is the perfect gift for girls fans of Disney movies and as a collectible piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, vibrant doll and accessories
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautifully made doll from the new Disney movie Wish (main character Asha and some of her animal friends, hidden behind windows to discover like a surprise). She has movable arms and legs, a colorful dress and plastic belt and removable shoes. Her hair is long, fashioned into tiny braids. The details are stunning, including her big amber brown eyes and freckles across her nose. Her face wears a contented smile. She's packaged very nicely with her accompaniments, and the contents are easy to slide out (or, open the perforated windows to get to the surprises). This would be an amazing gift for any child or adult who loves the movie, or collects Disney collectibles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great quality doll that your kids will enjoy!
reviews.reviewText: From box to doll to surprise, this is a well designed toy! The box is gorgeous and lets you recreate some of the fun of opening an advent calendar. The doll is well made, great clothes and wonderfully textured hair. It does have limited movement, similar to a classic Barbie doll. The surprises are great accessories and help add to the play factor for this toy.I appreciate the simplicity. No batteries. No complicated instructions. No annoying noises. Just plenty of opportunity for imaginative play.Please not that the packaging does recommend for kids 3 and up. Some of the surprise figures are small enough to be choking hazards for littles. Keep this in mind if you are considering purchasing for a small kid or have littles around the house. We have to keep it in mind because our toddler puts everything in his mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a beautiful doll
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves playing with this doll and was so excited when opening it. It's made beautifully and very durable. And it's an excellent depiction of Asha from the facial features to the gorgeous hair and outfit. It also includes adorable little animal friends, Wish star and basket. It came very well packaged, she even had fun opening it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful doll set
reviews.reviewText: The packaging on this is stunning. It's set up like an advent surprise box, even though it's not marketed as one, you could always buy it to do a smaller advent countdown if you wanted. The doll is in a big compartment with a clear window, and the animal friends and basket are behind little doors that you open to reveal. The doll is a really nice size, well made with a beautiful dress. Hair looks nice. All in all this is a really great little gift set that would be perfect for a birthday, easter basket, christmas etc. It's packaged nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful doll, pretty box, lots of cute animal friends
reviews.reviewText: This Asha doll is so pretty and would make the perfect gift for any fan of Wish! I absolutely LOVE that the box is made like an advent calendar. You have to open each door to reveal a special surprise!Sometimes the accessories that come with dolls are a real let down but in this case, the accessories are just as much fun as the doll! Asha comes with some super cute, detailed accessories - 6 woodland friends, adorable Star and a basket.Asha is dressed in her beautiful, iconic purple dress. Her shoes are removable but they don't always stay on that well. Her gorgeous braided hair looks just like it does in the movie!

El paquete vino roto por debajo, no venia muy protegido, como era para vitrina y lo pensaba sacar no me importó, pero si hubiese sido para regalo no habría manera de presentarlo así, lo habría cambiado, por lo demás, la muñeca muy bonita y los animales no están mal, son plástico pensé que serían de pvc pero son bonitos
